contents: 给组件添加precision属性可以指定输入值的小数位数，当指定为0时，则只能输入整数

highlighted.content:
import Spinner from 'kpc/components/spinner';

<div>
    <Spinner v-model="value1"
        max={{ 10 }}
        min={{ 0 }}
        precision={{ 0 }}
    />
    <Spinner v-model="value2"
        max={{ 10 }}
        min={{ -10 }} 
        step={{ 0.1 }}
        precision={{ 1 }}
    />
</div>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';
import './index.styl'; 

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;
}

<template>
    <div>
        <Spinner v-model="value1"
            :max="10"
            :min="0"
            :precision="0"
        />
        <Spinner v-model="value2"
            :max="10"
            :min="-10" 
            :step="0.1"
            :precision="1"
        />
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import Spinner from 'kpc/components/spinner';

export default {
    components: {
        Spinner
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "value1": null,
            "value2": null
        }
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
import Spinner from 'kpc/components/spinner';

export default class extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {};
    }

    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <Spinner value={this.state.value1}
                    on$change-value={(c, value1) => this.setState({value1})}
                    max={10}
                    min={0}
                    precision={0}
                />
                <Spinner value={this.state.value2}
                    on$change-value={(c, value2) => this.setState({value2})}
                    max={10}
                    min={-10} 
                    step={0.1}
                    precision={1}
                />
            </div>
        )
    }
}
